definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Objective To observe the distribution of the neuropeptides in mouse sublingual gland.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察小鼠舌下腺内神经肽的分布。

sentences.english: In addition, the film formulation also has a dissolve time that is twice as fast as tablets.
sentences.chinese: 另外，该薄膜制剂的溶解时间较舌下片快2倍。

sentences.english: E vil was sweet in his mouth, and he hid it under his tongue.
sentences.chinese: 邪恶在他口中虽觉甘甜，藏在他的舌下。

sentences.english: Conclusion Hypoglossal schwannoma is extremely rare.
sentences.chinese: 结论舌下神经鞘瘤罕见。

sentences.english: HRP was injected into the hypoglossal nerve of rabbit.
sentences.chinese: 用HRP法研究了兔舌下神经的纤维成分和起源。

sentences.english: It is feasible to treat severe xerophthalmia by the free grafting of sublingual gland.
sentences.chinese: 舌下腺游离移植治疗重症干眼症是可行的。

sentences.english: Results 18 clincal data on submaxillary type cyst of sublingual gland were cured by surgical operations.
sentences.chinese: 结果18例颌下型舌下腺囊肿均行手术治愈。

sentences.english: The anatomic relationship of lingual artery and hypoglossal nerve was observed and measured.

sentences.english: The labelled fibers were found in the tracheosyringealis of hypoglossal nerve.

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical features and treatment methods of hypoglossal neurinomas(HN).
sentences.chinese: 研究舌下神经鞘瘤的临床特点和治疗方法。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of methyl carprost suppository given sublingually on postpartum bleeding in normal parturients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨舌下含服卡前列甲酯栓预防产后出血的效果。

sentences.english: Characteristics of sublingual venae in primary liver cancer patients in different clinical stages.
sentences.chinese: 不同临床分期原发性肝癌患者的舌下络脉特征。

sentences.english: The outer aperture of JF was adjacent to the hypoglossal canal.
sentences.chinese: 颈静脉孔的外口与舌下神经管相毗邻。

sentences.english: Objective:To find out the diagnostic utility of sublingual veins for Blood-stasis Syndrome by means of diagnostic tests.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价舌下络脉表现对于血瘀证的诊断价值。

sentences.english: The doctor said she sublingual small pimple without problems, drink plenty of water on the line.
sentences.chinese: 医生说婆婆舌下的小疙瘩无碍，多喝水就行了。

sentences.english: Only the simple aperture sublingual gland is observed. Its shape is horseshoes, and the colour is amber.
